attributes.action: Our government is not fit for purpose. Make a new independent group do Brexit.
attributes.additional_details: I propose that we should allow some sort of independent group take over the Brexit deal that are NON-Political related people. The government is currently just a joke in regards to Brexit and countries all over the world are laughing at us because of this.
attributes.background: After the following speight of Brexit option declines I feel the current government is not fit for purpose and no longer has the people vote in their best interests. MPs seem determined to make a mockery of the people by not even agreeing to 1 of the 8 options provided by Theresa May.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
